markdownRemark.html:
In this impromptu bonus episode we discuss and explore 2024 PT5, the new ‘second moon’ which will accompany us through the cosmos for the next two months. Join us as we talk with our special guest in this off the cuff episode of OSMOSISCAST.

The paper can be found here if you would like to follow along with the discussion. You can find the current location of 2024 PT5 in the sky using The Sky Live. Asteroid deflection is discussed and NASA’s DART mission provided demonstration of this in 2022.

Osmosis is hosted by Jamie McMillan and Calum Morris, we were joined on this episode by Lauren Bailey. Find us where you find your podcasts or on YouTube. If you would like to request a paper to be discussed on the show, get in touch.

frontmatter.description: In this impromptu bonus episode we discuss and explore 2024 PT<sub>5</sub>, the new 'second moon' which will accompany us through the cosmos for the next two months.
frontmatter.title: Mini moon bonus episode (with special guest!)
